relacionesInternacionales.parrafoUno: The National University of La Plata is one of the most prestigious centers of the national research and teaching system, making it a key reference point in the cultural and academic development of our country.
relacionesInternacionales.parrafoDos: , aims to develop strategies for strengthening and integration along with coordination between institutions and resources, ensuring shared and permanent international cooperation.

errors.apellido: The last name must contain only letters. Minimum 2 and maximum 50 characters
errors.nombre: The first name must contain only letters. Minimum 2 and maximum 50 characters
errors.email: The email must be at least 3 characters long and no more than 50 characters
errors.numero_pasaporte: The passport must contain only numbers and letters
errors.numero_cedula_de_identidad: The identity card must contain only numbers
errors.universidad_origen: The home university must be at least 3 characters long and no more than 50 characters
errors.consulado_visacion: The visa consulate must be no more than 50 characters long
errors.apellido_tutor_institucional: The institutional tutor's last name must contain only letters. Minimum 2 and maximum 50 characters
errors.nombre_tutor_institucional: The institutional tutor's first name must contain only letters. Minimum 2 and maximum 50 characters
errors.email_tutor_institucional: The institutional tutor's email must be at least 3 characters long and no more than 50 characters
errors.apellido_tutor_academico: The academic tutor's last name must contain only letters. Minimum 2 and maximum 50 characters
errors.nombre_tutor_academico: The academic tutor's first name must contain only letters. Minimum 2 and maximum 50 characters
errors.email_tutor_academico: The academic tutor's email must be at least 3 characters long and no more than 50 characters
errors.archivo_pasaporte: The passport has an invalid file format. Only .pdf, .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files are allowed
errors.archivo_cedula: The identity card has an invalid file format. Only .pdf, .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files are allowed
errors.plan_trabajo: The work plan has an invalid file format. Only .pdf, .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files are allowed
errors.carta_recomendacion: The letter of recommendation has an invalid file format. Only .pdf, .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files are allowed
errors.certificado_b1: The B1 certificate has an invalid file format. Only .pdf, .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files are allowed
errors.fecha_de_nacimiento: The birth date cannot be later than the current date
